document.full_text: gaza militant groups signaled on saturday they would halt rocket fire at israel if the jewish state stopped shootings as well, after a surge in cross-border violence prompted fears of a possible escalation into war.
document.title: gaza militants signal ready to halt fire
lines_and_colors: gaza militant groups signaled on saturday they would halt rocket fire at israel if the jewish state stopped shootings as well, after a surge in cross-border violence prompted fears of a possible escalation into war.
